comment.author: 25634208@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called The Sutherland Shire, NSW. Australia., and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 8234140@N05
comment._content: What a fabulous shot. I have a quite a few 'picnic' shots from my family taken over the course of the last century. I love a picnic, and think it's a shame we don't tend to do it like they used to. Is this perhaps taken in the 20s? That woman kneeling towards the front looks to be from that era, and my father seemed to wear outfits like the small boy to her right, when he was a young picknicker in the 20s.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
Thanks for that littleteapot. Looking at your own family photos seems a good way to help date these images.

Not quite the right weather for picnics, this long weekend just gone!
